title: I have "spellcheck as you type" enabled but it quit working recently
content: I have "spellcheck as you type" enabled but it quit working recently. Have others experienced this?

title: migrating from (really) old TB to 91
content:
Is it possible to keep my old 'local folders' email folders? To install 91 I was forced to create a new identity with the new TB version. I made a copy of the old email file in the default location at C:\Users\...\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\27rt9l92.default Now all I have is inbox. All mail filters and addressbooks are gone.  :(

Paul
creator: patriot15

title: Google now wants me to access my Gmail from Thunderbird using 'sign in with Google' rather than IMAP, but there is no option to do this in TB settings.

content: I'm just getting used to Thunderbird. Maybe there's a setting I've missed. Is there a way in the app to indicate an email has successfully been sent? A sound or a popup? Like on the protonmail app it has a banner starting that the email has been sent. Thanks.

title: Thunderbird crashes when creating a new email account
content: Hello, I'm using Thunderbird version 140.2.1esr (64-bit). I want to create a new account with a different email address. In the first dialog, I'm asked for my "Full Name" and "Email Address." After that, I only have the option to click "Continue." Thunderbird then crashes, and even after several minutes, it doesn't continue. I've attached a screenshot. Creating multiple accounts is actually quite common for me; I've done it several times in the past with previous versions of Thunderbird without any problems. Thank you for your support. Regards, Jürgen
creator: juergen120

title: Imap do not work suddenly
content:
Hi Suddenly Thunderbid IMAP does not work anymore on Axigen mail. It cant connect to SMTP server, from Axigen they say all is good and their webmail is working ok. I did delete lots of mails to get more space but no help. Last update on thunderbird was 05.09.2025 and error occured 08.09.2025

Little noobie on these things, hope there is an easy solution, thanks in advance. Brgds Kari Laukka
creator: kari.laukka

title: Junk mail can only be fetched manually?
content: I'm trying to find an automated solution to fetch emails in the Junk Email folder. I have already selected this folder for offline use. My goal is to automatically move all email from the Junk Email folder to INBOX via an extension. But as long as email in the Junk Email folder isn't fetched, the extension doesn't work. Is there a solution? My version of Thunderbird is 128.14 on Linux Mint, and I use IMAP.
creator: wieger

title: No puedo enviar correos con Thunderbird
content: Hola a todos. Desde hace unos días, no puedo enviar mensajes (si los recibo), me sale un cartel diciendo "Falló el envío del mensaje. El mensaje no se ha podido enviar porque ha caducado la conexión al servidor de salida (SMTP) smtp.xxx-xxxxxxxxx.com. Vuelva a intentarlo." He revisado todos los datos del servidor de salida y son los mismos que tenía antes. he cambiado a varios puertos diferentes y nada. También he reinstalado a la última versión y sigue sin funcionar. No se si es problema de thunderbird o de windows, pero lo raro es que nos pasa a los 5 compañeros que tenemos esta dirección de correo común. Alguien sabe que puedo hacer? Muchas gracias de antemano.
creator: dpi2

title: crash crash crash
content: If there's one thing I can count on, it's that the next version of Thunderbird will be more buggy & unstable that the previous version, and v 140 certainly does not disappoint in that category. It crashes & closes multiple times per day. Any time something else may be using a lot of resources, Thunderbird freezes up and if I click on it, the app crashes & closes. At least the previous just stayed greyed out until it was able to complete the task and didn't crash & close. Great job Mozilla.
creator: geodave50

title: Thunderbird
content: Каждый раз при запуске программы начинается индексация всех писем в почте, это занимает большое количество времени и в это время я не могу экспортировать письма. На почте достаточно большой объем данных за несколько лет, но возможности архивировать часть нет, поскольку эта информация постоянно используется в работе. Есть ли какие настройки, чтобы индексировать не весь объем писем, а например, за определенный период?
creator: jaschik1987
